title: Smash It! Calorie Calculator
description: This serves as a lead magnet and customer tool for a nutritionist. Built using SolidJS for the logic and Astro for the page.

title: Cross Connect
description: Built using vanilla JS, HTML and CSS to keep data requirements smaller. I designed and built this site with close consultation with the client. I am continuing to advise them on improving their copy and developing service targetted landing pages.

title: Artists Portfolio
description: I built this portfolio site to allow my father to show off his amazing art work. It features a responsive design, full screen image enlargements and utilises Netlify form control.

title: Loop Studio Landing Page
description: A responsive landing page for a VR studio. Built from a design supplied by Frontend Mentor.

title: Music Player
description: Built using React and Sass. A responsive music player that highlights the tune playing in the library and changes images for each tune. This was completed as part of The Creative React and Redux Course by DevEd

title: EasyBank Landing Page
description: A responsive landing page for a digital bank. Built from a design supplied by Frontend Mentor.

title: Sunnyside Agency Landing Page
description: A responsive landing page for a creative agency. Built from a design supplied by Frontend Mentor.

title: Deadline Sorter
description: A 'no distraction, no nonsense' app built at the request of my wife, a primary school teacher, as she was struggling to keep track of all her deadlines. Deadlines can be added, marked completed, removed and sorted by due date.
